sn35.171-173:1.1: “Yam, bhikkhave, dukkham, tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.171-173:1.3: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, dukkham; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.171-173:1.5: mano dukkho; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.171-173:1.6: Yam, bhikkhave, dukkham tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
